mean_cn: adj. 未满学龄的，就学前的，入学前的；  n. 幼儿园，育幼院
mean_en: relating to the time in a child's life when the child is old enough to talk and walk but is not ready to go to school
word_etyma: pre…前的，预先+school学校→上学前的→preschool学龄前的
sentence: My kid's in preschool now, but he'll be in kindergarten next year.
sentence_trans: 我的孩子现在上托儿所，但他明年就可以上幼儿园了。
